newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Kasogi says proposing rights issue.
newsitem.headline: Kasogi says proposing rights issue.

text.p: Indonesian shoe manufacturer PT Kasogi International said on Friday it will propose a rights issue soon.
A company official said that the firm was holding an analysts' meeting on Friday to discuss the plan, which is subject to shareholders approval on June 9.
The official said the company planned to propose one-for-one rights at a price of 1,000 rupiah to raise about 63 billion rupiah.
"About 70 percent of proceeds will be used for investment and the remaining 30 percent will be allocated to enhance working capital," the official said.
At 0810 GMT, shares of Kasogi were up 100 rupiah at 1,275 on a volume of 8.1 million shares. Thye were earlier at a high of 1,325 on market talk of the rights issue.
